name: PDFAppearanceCharacteristicsKey
desc: Keys to control a widget’s appearance.

items.name: static let backgroundColor: PDFAppearanceCharacteristicsKey
items.desc: The background color of the widget annotation.

items.name: static let borderColor: PDFAppearanceCharacteristicsKey
items.desc: The border color of the widget annotation.

items.name: static let caption: PDFAppearanceCharacteristicsKey
items.desc: The text that the button widget annotation displays when the user isn’t interacting with it.

items.name: static let downCaption: PDFAppearanceCharacteristicsKey
items.desc: The text that the button widget annotation displays when the user holds down on it.

items.name: static let rolloverCaption: PDFAppearanceCharacteristicsKey
items.desc: The text that the button widget annotation displays when the user hovers the pointer over it.

items.name: static let rotation: PDFAppearanceCharacteristicsKey
items.desc: The number of degrees, in multiples of 90, that the widget annotation rotates counterclockwise relative to the page.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates an appearance characteristic key using the specified raw string.
